name: Dungeon Chaos (Human INC)
description:
This was made for the Brackys 2021.2 game jam. The theme was "Let there be chaos".

You just got fired from your job at a dungeon and your seeking to cause a bit of chaos there by killing the boss. It is a bit hard and will take multiple tries but don't worry each death can help you unlock different characters to fight with. (best played full screen)

In case you skipped the tutorial here's the controls: WASD - move, Left click - shoot, Right click - dodge, M - map, you will find health kits and grenades in the dungeon use them by clicking the item in your hot bar.

Hope you enjoy!

Thaleah Fat Free Pixel Font:            https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059
